item.title: Kamran add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "Absolute power does not corrupt absolutely, absolute power attracts the corruptible." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
Kamran add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "Old lady judges watch people in pairs Limited in sex, they dare To push fake morals, insult and stare While money doesn't talk, it swears Obscenity, who really cares Propaganda, all is phony." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Warren Zevon
Kamran add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Everything was beautiful and nothing hurt." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "I've been riding on the crest of a slump lately." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Sherwood Anderson
item.description: "It is no use. I find it impossible to work with security staring me in the face. " -- Sherwood Anderson

item.title: Kamran add a quote by S.E. Hinton
item.description: "Can you see the sunset real good on the West side? You can see it on the East side too." -- S.E. Hinton

item.title: Kamran add a quote by Dalton Trumbo
item.description: "did anybody ever come back from the dead any single one of the millions who got killed did any one of them ever come back and say by god i'm glad i'm dead because death is always better than dishonor? did they say i'm glad i died to make the world safe for democracy? did they say i like death better than losing liberty? did any of them ever say it's good to think i got my guts blown out for the honor of my country? did any of them ever say look at me i'm dead but i died for decency and that's better than being alive? did any of them ever say here i am i've been rotting for two years in a foreign grave but it's wonderful to die for your native land? did any of them say hurray i died for womanhood and i'm happy see how i sing even though my mouth is choked with worms?" -- Dalton Trumbo
